item.title: Changing GitHub Enterprise users from LDAP to local
item.description: I needed to have most users move to a different AD/LDAP server but leave a few behind on local logins. The instructions from GitHub support had issues I had to figure out on my own.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bouvier

item.title: Don't idolize Elon Musk
item.description: I responded to someone on LinkedIn shaming people for using "I don't have time" as an excuse and praising Elon Musk's overworking habits. Wanted to capture my response here as well.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bouvier

item.title: First rack for my homelab
item.description: My first open rack for the homelab and the initial equipment I've put in it.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bouvier

item.title: Temperature and Humidity Sensors (part one)
item.description: I have a home from 1914 which has a lot of charm and a lot of issues. One of which is the need to constantly pay attention to the humidity levels and temperature in all floors, finished and unfinished, in the house. This project of my homelab will cover the hardware and custom software I write for it.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bouvier

item.title: How I made this site (part two)
item.description: Now to finish off the tutorial on how I made this site including previewing the content and automating some tasks with invoke.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bouvier

item.title: How I made this site (part one)
item.description: First post on site, about making the site, while I'm building the site. So meta.
